about_the_game:
You are Legion, a secret agent who can modify his appearance at will.

Agencies around the world call on your exceptional ability to carry out dangerous missions.

To approach your targets, you must succeed in passing yourself off as one of their loved ones: become a husband, a brother, a son…

The possibilities are endless.

But be careful: the slightest misstep can mean… Death.

● Investigate

A file detailing your new identity will be provided to you for each mission. By cross-referencing its documents, you will have to find the appropriate appearance.

Be thorough, as each document is important… Yes, even this chocolate bar wrapper.

● Change your look

Use the operating room to customize Legion's appearance.

Age, hairstyle, nose, eye color… Everything can be changed.

Find the right look for your mission, among more than 900 million combinations!

● Go on your mission

If you have the correct look, you will be able to approach your target.

But be careful, the mission doesn't end there: you will also have to act in accordance with your new identity to gain his trust.

The file you have studied will help you in your task... As well as the notes you have taken care to write on your left hand!

☞ Legion Was Here is also

  • 2-3 hours of play

  • A wide variety of missions

    Apart from the usual spy agencies (FBI, MI6...), you will sometimes have to deal with more unusual clients - ghosts from the past or amusement park mascots, everyone can hire Legion!

  • The perfect agent

    You will always be able to redo missions to improve your score.

    As long as you don't reach 100%, you weren't totally credible...

    But stay vigilant, as the missions won't unfold the same way every time!

  • About the developer

    Game made entirely solo (except for the saxophone, played by my friend Pierre) and without recourse to AI.

● Demo version

The Legion Was Here demo lets you complete a single mission. You will have to foil an alien attack on Mount Rushmore!
